name: Motel Bondage
description:
You were bound by robbers in a motel. Get to the knife to cut the ropes with which you are tied.

Key Features:

  • You will control the bound girl. You will have to jump to move, because her legs are also tied.
  • 10 levels with different difficulty.
  • Infinite replayability. The knife will appear all the time in different places.
  • Customization. You can change the color of hair, rope and underwear as you like. And also choose one of several gags.
